On Mon, Apr 27, 2009 at 04:52, Solomon Duskis <sduskis@...> wrote:
> I would say that forms are are part of the hypertext constraint (and
> workspaces) as well.

To make things a bit clearer, forms are simply links with a UI
attached to help people write the links, nothing more. They are just
links. I can search Google by typing in ?q=some%20stuff%20here at the
end of the link to their main website. It's just a link. Forms are
part of HATEOAS since links are part of HATEOAS.

Just had to mention that. :)


Regards,

Alex
